name: Space Odyssey
description: Invading your tea collection from space. May contain traces of aliens.

name: Sweet Dreams
description: Drink yourself to sleep with our collection help put you under.

name: Chocolate Heaven
description: Ever wanted more chocolate in your tea? Now you can have it.

name: Black Bandit
description: For when you can't get enough black tea, so you have to steal it from the best.

name: Floral Fiesta
description: Flowers blossom all year round, and so should your enjoyment of tea.

name: Smokey Wood
description: Lay down by the fire and try our smokey range of herbal teas.

name: McDonalds
description: Big mac and cheese are all you need when you're driking tea.

name: Dress
description: Why dress up yourself when you can put a dress on your tea's flavour.

name: Perth Pleasures
description: Enjoy our Perth made collection where you can make pleasurable teas your destination.

name: New Car
description: Do you enjoy a new car smell? If so, then this collection is the one for you.
